answers.answer: They'll test for protein in your urine, if your blood pressure is high, if u have major swelling. Any severe headaches, vision problems etc.just went through it this week
I have really bad headaches that won't go away, dizziness, nausea, some swelling and my blood pressure is always leaning towards the higher side.

My ob diagnosed with bp readings over two consecutive appointments and testing urine for protein. This is my 2nd pregnancy with preeclamplsia. My first was delivered at 35wks when bp reached 170/140 and no longer repsonded to meds. This time I've been on meds since 15wks and do far managed ok. Good luck!
Thank you! I'm just glad it's not a blood test, I'm terrible with needles.

Not to scare you but most likely he may suggest a blood test to test how your liver is as if u have preeclampsia it could affect it. But not to worry, its pretty rare. These past 2 weeks ive been having blood test after blood test, turns out everything is normal :) good luck !!

question: My midwife said next appointment she'll test to see if I have preeclampsia, just wanted to know how they test for it?
title: testing for preeclampsia?
